description: This Kotlin source file defines a ViewModel class 'AddViewModel' and a composable function 'AddTransactionScreen' for adding financial transactions in a personal expense tracker app. The ViewModel manages state for transaction details and handles saving transactions via a repository, while the composable provides the UI for user input and interaction.

classes.name: AddViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class that manages the state and logic for adding a new transaction, including input fields and saving process.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Validates input and adds a new transaction to the repository, then calls a callback upon success.
